entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
